subject: Vam pros order
description_text:
Hi I made a vam pro order a week ago and I still don’t have them delivered
to me , please check on my order . Here are my ssn and order number :

SSN5727

Order number : SF6047224806072

conversations.body_text: Hi Yaniel Aponte,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We'll ship it out within the next couple of days and sincerely apologize for the delay.

I’m sorry I never got the link for the shipping, can you please send it
again?

On Mon, Jan 12, 2026 at 4:49 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Yaniel Aponte,    Here is your shipping link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806072
